text: تِلۡكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

translation.en: These are the limits [set by] Allah, and whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger will be admitted by Him to gardens [in Paradise] under which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein; and that is the great attainment
translation.id: Itulah batas-batas (hukum) Allah. Barang siapa taat kepada Allah dan Rasul-Nya, Dia akan memasukkannya ke dalam surga-surga yang mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai, mereka kekal di dalamnya. Dan itulah kemenangan yang agung
